name: Tilted (Thuefordevs)
description:
As everyone should know, the earth is a flat disc carried by a giant turtle.

In "Tilted", your goal is to balance the earth on the turtles back: If it gets tilted too much, it's game over!

Drag and drop humans with your mouse to restore the balance. Use powerful abilities in heated situations. After using an ability, the next mouse click activates it. Once per game, the emergency button can be used as a last resort to make all humans run to the middle of the earth!

Fight for the highest score, determined by the maximum number of humans present simultaneously!
